nodes.text: A systems analyst was a position held by Human female Lomina Argo and Valsi Nocurja in 22 BBY.

The title "Systems Analyst" was first mentioned in 2002 in Volume 531, Issue 46 of the HoloNet News feed. The title was mentioned in an article entitled "Jedi Refuse to Hand Over Baby Ludi" created by Pablo Hidalgo and Paul Ens.
